title: Refreshing Cucumber Lemonade Recipe
description: Lemonade with cucumber juice is a unique way to serve this homemade summery drink. Serve cold or over ice garnished with lemon and cucumber slices.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Drinks Recipes Lemonade Recipes Refreshing Cucumber Lemonade 4.3 (77) 58 Reviews 9 Photos Lemonade and cucumber juice pair perfectly in this refreshing homemade summer drink. Serve in the pitcher with cucumber and lemon slices. Submitted by DASHKAYDOT Updated on May 2, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 9 9 9 9 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Additional Time: 30 mins Total Time: 50 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 cup water ½ cup white sugar 1 cucumber, sliced 6 lemons, juiced Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Make the simple syrup: Combine water and sugar together in a saucepan over medium heat; heat until just about to boil and sugar has dissolved. Place in refrigerator until cool, about 30 minutes. Blend cucumber in a blender or food processor until mashed into a pulp. Pour cucumber pulp into a fine mesh strainer placed over a bowl; allow to sit until you have about 2/3 cup of cucumber juice in the bowl, about 15 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir simple syrup, cucumber juice, and lemon juice together in a pitcher. Serve cold. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 117 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 141 Calories 1g Fat 46g Carbs 3g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 141 % Daily Value * Total Fat 1g 1% Saturated Fat 0g 1% Sodium 8mg 0% Total Carbohydrate 46g 17% Dietary Fiber 8g 29% Total Sugars 26g Protein 3g 5% Vitamin C 131mg 146% Calcium 116mg 9% Iron 1mg 8% Potassium 348mg 7% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Refreshing Cucumber Lemonade 01 of 09 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 09 Photo by  PoliteBean5903 04/16/2023 “..6 lemons juice’It means 6 slices of lemons i suppose and not 6 whole lemons. I use one whole lemon n juiced it down and mix with the cucumber juice and its already much sour enough. Will try it with jus 6 Sliced of Lemons. - Sliced and not the whole lemon. 03 of 09 Photo by  Max Martorana 08/04/2015 04 of 09 Photo by  Maknoli 07/04/2015 05 of 09 Photo by  Maryam N Aliyu 07/23/2014 06 of 09 Photo by  Scotdog 05/01/2013 07 of 09 Photo by  MoreCoffeePlease 11/12/2011 I have made this several times since finding the recipe and love it. I have added more water to get the flavor I wanted. I also mix a cup of water with the unpeeled cucumber in the blender to make the blending process easier. I don't mind a little cucumber pulp getting through a mesh strainer, but putting a coffee filter in my strainer creates a more refined drink. This also goes nicely with Grey Goose. 08 of 09 Photo by  SunnyByrd 07/13/2009 This lemonade is delicious. It was a little strong and sweet for me, so I added water and ice to it, but very easy to adjust to taste. Thanks for the recipe! 09 of 09 Photo by  DASHKAYDOT 06/19/2009 1 You’ll Also Love Watermelon Lemonade 87 Ratings Vintage Lemonade 339 Ratings Watermelon and Strawberry Lemonade 193 Ratings Amy's Lavender Lemonade 76 Ratings Hot Pink Lemonade 71 Ratings Orangeade 27 Ratings Southern-Style Vanilla Lemonade 24 Ratings Brazilian Lemonade 473 Ratings Amy's Cucumber Lemonade 2 Ratings Rico's Passionate Pink Honey Lemonade 44 Ratings Watermelon-Raspberry Lemonade 2 Ratings Tasty Lemonade 34 Ratings Lavender Lemonade 29 Ratings Old-Fashioned Lemonade 472 Ratings Easy Strawberry Lemonade 132 Ratings Old-Fashioned Pink Lemonade 81 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
